articles.description: David Beckham pays tribute to "true gentleman" Sven-Goran Eriksson and says he will be "forever grateful" to the ex-England manager, who has died aged 76.
articles.title: Sven-Goran Eriksson: David Beckham leads tributes to former England manager

articles.description: Great Britain's Jan Choinski makes his US Open debut before Coco Gauff begins her US Open title defence on day one in New York.
articles.title: US Open LIVE: Gauff, Djokovic, Zheng & Sabalenka in action on day one - live scores, results, order of play

articles.description: Former England manager Sven-Goran Eriksson dies at the age of 76.
articles.title: Sven-Goran Eriksson dies: Former England manager passes away aged 76

articles.description: Sven-Goran Eriksson was engaging, courteous and a shrewd tactician - and he could, and should, have ended England's trophy drought.
articles.title: Sven-Goran Eriksson obituary: Ex-England manager who could and should have ended trophy drought

articles.description: England pick five uncapped players for next month's white-ball series against Australia but leave out Jonny Bairstow and Moeen Ali.
articles.title: England v Australia: Jonny Bairstow and Moeen Ali left out as England pick five uncapped players

articles.description: Former Real Madrid and Everton playmaker James Rodriguez joins La Liga club Rayo Vallecano as a free agent.
articles.title: James Rodriguez: Ex-Real Madrid and Everton playmaker joins Rayo Vallecano

articles.description: Tanni Grey-Thompson says Paris will want to "move the Paralympic bar up another notch" from London 2012.
articles.title: Paralympics 2024: 'I don’t want London to be best Games ever' - Tanni Grey-Thompson

articles.description: Brighton & Hove Albion sign Denmark midfielder Matt O'Riley from Scottish champions Celtic.
articles.title: Matt O'Riley: Brighton sign Celtic and Denmark midfielder for more than £25m

articles.description: England's Georgia Hall is one of four wildcard picks made by Europe captain Suzann Pettersen for next month's Solheim Cup against the US.
articles.title: Solheim Cup: Georgia Hall handed European wildcard spot to face United States in Virginia

articles.description: Everton striker Neal Maupay responds to a group of supporters who verbally abused Toffees players at London Euston station.
articles.title: Everton: Maupay responds to fans who verbally abused players
